headline: Assessing eBay (EBAY) Valuation As Flat Buyers And Margin Pressure Cloud Growth Prospects
summary: Why eBay’s user and margin trends are back in focus Recent updates on eBay (EBAY) have put its flat active buyer base of 134 million and a 3.5 percentage point EBITDA margin decline in the spotlight, raising fresh questions about the stock’s long term appeal for investors. See our latest analysis for eBay. After a mixed few months, eBay’s 1 month share price return of 10.96% and 7 day gain of 5.06% have brought the stock to $91.51. Its 1 year total shareholder return of 47.08% points to...
